The Beach.Body:
You stand on The Beach.
Glimmering seas shine to the east and a dense rainforest watches you from the west.
The unbroken beach follows the coastline south, while a path of dirt and sand meanders up north, leading to high bluffs.
This would be a beautiful place to drive your first bomb into the earth of the island.

Your bomb, a silver pillar of dormant incendiary power, sticks out of the sand like a sore thumb.

The Rainforest.Body:
You creep through The Rainforest.
This forest path connects the turquoise sea on both sides, with the bright beach to the east and a shaded cove down a sharp incline to the west.
Similarly, daylight filters through the trees to the north, while the southern reaches of the rainforest are dark.

The Cove.Body:
You wade across The Cove.
The inclined path you slid down to arrive here cannot be scaled, but luckily there seems to be a shallow reef protecting this side of the island from harsh waves, providing a path to the northwest, around the island.
A wide stone plateau, thrust out from the center of the cove, would be the perfect spot to place a warhead.

The Reef.Body:
You trudge through The Reef, thick leather boots protecting you from the sharp coral.
The only way out of the fragile ecosystem is via a small, muddy beach that leads to a clearing in the rainforest.
